price: Dhaloota boodaa keessattis faaruu gaarii naaf taasisi.
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
